title: It wont load
body:
how do i bug report i cant post files in here even though the clkient tells me to do that


fix your shit

replies.body: hey lads games working now, i tried to copy paste what the thing that it copied to my clipboard but it didnt work

Have you updated ur computer these days? Specifically, last night?
If yes, reset your computer to the preview version, and everything will be all right

As far as I know, you can't attach files to bug reports and at no point does the bug report form indicate that you can do so, so I'm not sure what you're seeing.

If you could clarify where you are seeing this message and why attaching a file to a bug report would be necessary that would be very helpful.
